title: Best of The Herd for 06/10/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for 06/10/2019
description:
Colin says movies without stars usually disappoint and so do the NBA Finals when the biggest star is missing. He talks about Lakers players struggling with having their childhood idol and now teammate trying to have them traded. He admits where he was right and wrong over the last week. Plus, the legendary Charles Barkley talks about the futures of Kevin Durant and Kawhi Leonard and why the NBA has a major issue on its hands.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
